author: HispanTV
title: Tribunal Supremo de Justicia certifica victoria de Maduro | HISPANTV
text:
En Venezuela el Tribunal Supremo de Justicia culminó el análisis de las pruebas que convalidan la reelección del presidente Nicolás Maduro.
Esta sede principal del Tribunal Supremo de Justicia fue de nuevo el centro de atención en Venezuela. La presidenta del tribunal y de la Sala Electoral fue la encargada de leer ante embajadores y funcionarios la sentencia final en el recurso contencioso sobre el resultado de las elecciones del 28 de julio.
La presidenta del Tribunal Supremo de Justicia, Caryslia Rodríguez declaró que con base en los resultados obtenidos en el proceso de peritaje “podemos concluir que los boletines emitidos por el Consejo Nacional Electoral respecto a la elección presidencial 2024 están respaldados por las actas de escrutinios emitidas por cada una de las máquinas de votación desplegadas en el proceso electoral. Y asimismo estas actas mantienen plena coincidencia con los registros de las bases de datos de los centros nacionales de totalización”.
Así la presidenta detallaba las razones de una decisión que es inapelable. Y que incluye además otras consideraciones, como el desacato del candidato Edmundo González, que queda ahora a un paso de decisiones judiciales en su contra.
En su decisión los supremos pidieron al fiscal general venezolano que avance en la investigación penal contra los responsables de la página web donde la oposición cargó supuestas actas electorales, con las cuales se autoproclamaron ganadores.
De esta forma el Tribunal Supremo de Justicia puso fin a semanas de tensión especialmente en medios y gobiernos extranjeros y ratificó los resultados de la última elección presidencial del 28 de julio y el nuevo mandato para Nicolás Maduro, a partir del año 2025.
Marcos Salgado, Caracas.

author: Jennifer Ribeiro
title: Em Jaraguari, primeira etapa do Festival de Circulação Musical acontece neste domingo
text: Neste domingo (3), Jaraguari sediará a 3ª edição do FestJar (Festival da Circulação Musical de Jaraguari). Este ano o evento terá cinco etapas, sendo a primeira realizada neste domingo (3). O projeto é uma iniciativa dedicada a valorizar e destacar os talentos locais, especialmente aqueles provenientes das comunidades rurais, que muitas das vezes têm dificuldade de acessar os eventos culturais que em sua maioria são feitos no perímetro urbano, especialmente nos grandes centros. O Festival será dividido nas seguintes etapas: 1ª eliminatória (3 de março/Assentamento Estrela); 2ª eliminatória (10 de março/Furnas do Dionísio – comunidade quilombola); 3ª eliminatória (24 de março/Jaraguari Velho – Sede); 4ª eliminatória (31 de março/Distrito Bonfim); Final (13 de abril/Jaraguari – centro do município) e Show de encerramento (1º de maio – Jaraguari – centro do município). Esse último com os 5 finalistas do concurso e artistas locais convidados. O vencedor levará para casa R$ 3 mil, o segundo colocado ganhará R$ 1,5 mil, o terceiro ficará com R$ 1 mil, o quarto R$ 700,00 e o quinto R$ 500,00. Paralelo ao concurso, haverá comercialização de produtos do campo com destaque para a gastronomia regional e criativa. A condição necessária para participar é que o candidato faça parte de uma das comunidades que irão sediar o FestJar. Os interessados na inscrição devem entrar em contato pelos telefones (67) 99986-5656 e 99955-4387 – ambos WhatsApp. Serviço – FestJar Assentamento Estrela (1ª eliminatória) – Dia 3.03, às 16h, localizado na zona rural, Núcleo 1, BR 262 – KM 20, s/nº. Furnas do Dionísio (2ª eliminatória) – Dia 10.03, a partir das 16h, no Salão Social da Associação de Pequenos Produtores Rurais da Comunidade Quilombola Furna dos Dionisio. Jaraguari sede e Jaraguari Velho (3ª eliminatória) – Dia 24.03, às 16h, na sede do município – endereço a definir. Distrito Bonfim (4ª eliminatória) – Dia 31.03, a partir das 16h, no Salão Paroquial da Igreja Bom Jesus – Rua Principal, s/nº. Jaraguari/centro do município (Final) – Dia 13.04, a partir das 16h, na sede do município – endereço a definir. Jaraguari (Show de encerramento) – Dia 1º de maio – a partir das 19h, na sede do município – endereço a definir.

author: @Nhan Dan en línea en español
title: Medio argentina destaca importancia de victoria de Dien Bien Phu | Nhan Dan en línea en español
text: Así lo valoró la página web ABC Mundial de Argentina a pocos días de conmemorarse el septuagésimo aniversario de la batalla de Dien Bien Phu, el 7 de mayo.Según ABC Mundial, bajo el liderazgo del Partido Comunista de Vietnam (PCV), encabezado por el Presidente Ho Chi Minh, el ejército vietnamita llevó a cabo una campaña militar que cambiaría el curso de la historia. “La Batalla de Dien Bien Phu se convirtió en un símbolo de la resistencia y determinación del pueblo vietnamita por su independencia”, enfatizó. Agregó además que la batalla de Dien Bien Phu no fue solo un enfrentamiento militar, sino un símbolo de la resistencia integral del pueblo vietnamita. “Desde la resistencia en el campo de batalla hasta la lucha política, económica y diplomática, todas las facetas de la sociedad vietnamita se unieron en un esfuerzo conjunto para expulsar a los invasores y avanzar hacia la construcción de una nación independiente y democrática”, subrayó. Mientras tanto, el ReporteAsia citó que después de 56 días de lucha con valentía, inteligencia y creatividad, “el ejército vietnamita hizo estragos en el enemigo destruyendo 62 aviones franceses y capturando a muchos enemigos”. | | El artículo de ReporteAsia sobre el significado de la Victoria de Dien Bien Phu. El periódico argentino subrayó el papel de liderazgo del PCV y del Presidente Ho Chi Minh en la guerra de resistencia popular, reuniendo así al gran bloque de unidad nacional y promoviendo un alto nivel de patriotismo de todo el pueblo. “El papel del Partido Comunista de Vietnam y del Presidente Ho Chi Minh fue fundamental en la movilización y organización del pueblo vietnamita. A través de una sólida educación política y la difusión de los lineamientos de lucha, se logró una unidad sin precedentes que llevó a la histórica victoria en Dien Bien Phu”, de acuerdo con ReporteAsia. Entretanto, la página web Ambito Internacional publicó un artículo que afirma el legado de la victoria de Dien Bien Phu después de sesenta años.“Esta victoria tuvo un significado trascendental y contribuyó en gran medida al progreso de la humanidad; demostrando una verdad a las naciones oprimidas e invadidas, si tienen una voluntad fuerte y un camino correcto, sabrán cómo unirse y luchar por su causa”, declaró.

author: Agência Lusa
title: Trabalhadores da STCP agendam duas novas greves, mas empresa garante serviços mínimos – Observador
text:
Os trabalhadores da Sociedade de Transportes Coletivos do Porto (STCP) vão fazer a partir de segunda-feira duas novas greves, nomeadamente uma de 50 horas e outra de 60 dias, anunciou esta quinta-feira o Sindicato dos Transportes Rodoviários Urbanos do Norte.
Estas duas novas greves na STCP convocadas pelo Sindicato dos Transportes Rodoviários Urbanos do Norte (STRUN) acontecem depois de outras duas já realizadas nos meses de julho e agosto.
Em comunicado, o STRUN especificou que a primeira greve, de 50 horas, realiza-se das 00h00 de segunda-feira às 2h00 de quarta-feira.
A segunda, de 60 dias e às cinco primeiras horas de serviço de cada trabalhador, começa às 2h00 de quarta-feira e termina às 2h00 de dia 17 de novembro, acrescentou.
O sindicato saúda os trabalhadores que têm demonstrado o seu descontentamento e apela a que se unam e voltem a dar uma resposta nestas próximas greves.
“É lamentável que todos os dias fiquem dezenas de percursos por fazer por falta de motoristas suficientes, como se pode verificar nas escalas” , referiu.
A STCP informou, igualmente em comunicado, que devido a esta greve de 50 horas a operação regular poderá sofrer perturbações estando, contudo, os serviços mínimos assegurados.
Os serviços mínimos definidos pelo Tribunal Arbitral envolvem, no período diurno dos dias úteis, seis viaturas na linha 205, cinco viaturas nas linhas 200 e 204 e três viaturas nas linhas 201, 207, 208 e 305.
PUB • CONTINUE A LER A SEGUIR
Já para o período noturno estão abrangidos pelos serviços mínimos duas viaturas nas linhas 200, 204, 205, 305, 502, 600, 602, 700, 701, 702, 801, 901/906 e 903 e uma viatura na linha 907.
No período de madrugada está previsto o funcionamento normal das linhas da rede de madrugada (1M, 2M, 3M, 4M, 5M, 7M, 8M, 9M, 10M, 11M, 12M, 13M).
A STCP recordou que, além desta greve de 50 horas, está igualmente agendada pela mesma entidade sindical uma segunda paralisação de trabalhadores, com início na quarta-feira (dia 18 de setembro) e por um período de 60 dias (até 17 de novembro), que se traduz numa greve às primeiras cinco horas de serviço.
E acrescentou: “Esta paralisação vem, assim, juntar-se à greve que está em vigor desde o passado dia 8 de novembro de 2023 e que diz respeito às duas últimas horas de serviço “.
A STCP sublinhou que, desde a concretização da intermunicipalização, em janeiro de 2021, “o conselho de administração da STCP tem reunido com as diversas entidades sindicais representantes dos seus trabalhadores com a finalidade de estabelecimento de compromissos que permitiram elevar/melhorar substancialmente as condições de trabalho de todos os trabalhadores da STCP”.
Na nota de informação, a STCP recordou que o STRUN, representante de cerca de 14% dos trabalhadores da STCP, foi o único dos cinco sindicatos que não assinou nenhum acordo em 2024.

author: Robin Pascoe
title: Strong winds could again stop New Year firework shows
text:
Strong winds could again stop New Year firework shows
Strong winds could cause problems for the organisers of fireworks displays on December 31, weather forecasters say.
Last year a number of shows, including the spectacular on the Erasmus bridge in Rotterdam, were scrapped because the winds would have made them too dangerous.
A spokesman for the organisers of the big shows in Amsterdam and Rotterdam said they would be cancelled if the wind was continually above wind speed 5, or a fresh breeze.
The light and laser shows organised for both Amsterdam and The Hague will not be affected.
The KNMI weather bureau is forecasting southerly winds of between 4 and 5 for the weekend, with some sunshine on Saturday but rain and temperatures of 9° to 11° the rest of the week.

author: JJ Stankevitz
title: For Colts' defensive line, record-setting sacks are key to wins – but not the group's focus
text: A year ago, the Colts' defensive line was chasing the wrong thing. The Colts had 43 sacks with two games left, four shy of setting an Indianapolis-era franchise record. The defensive line was chasing the record, not the process that would get them the record. And there were too many selfish rushes and not enough of a collective pass rush. Over the final two games of 2022, the Colts had one sack. In 2023, defensive line coach Nate Ollie doubled down on his core message, one that's resonated with a defensive line that got its record-setting 47th sack last week against the Atlanta Falcons. "We really talk about chasing God and putting God first," Ollie said. "And if we do that and chase him, everything else will fall into place." Through a commitment to unselfish, four-as-one pass rushes, the Colts' defense has one of the most impactful fronts in the NFL. Three players have eight or more sacks (Kwity Paye, Dayo Odeyingbo, Samson Ebukam), and 14 different players have at least a half-sack. The Colts are 7-0 when generating four or more sacks this season, and the impact of the sacks in those games has been significant. Of the 33 possessions in those seven wins on which the Colts have had at least one sack, those drives have ended like this: |Drive end event||Count| |Punt||17| |Field goal makes/attempts||5/7| |Turnovers||5| |End of half/game||2| |Turnover on downs||1| |Touchdowns||1| In those seven games with four or more sacks, the Colts allowed their opponents to score on 27.1 percent of their possessions, underscoring the cumulative impact of getting opposing quarterbacks to the ground so frequently. "You can kind of feel when you're winning early, you got the O-line on their heels, they're more susceptible to more moves because they're kind of playing on there heels, they're focused on what they got beat on earlier," Odeyingbo said. "So it kind of sets up other moves." Another aspect to why the Colts' defense has made such a major impact through sacks is the depth with which they're able to play. Ollie is constantly rotating his "alpha" and "bravo" groups, subbing four guys on and off like an NHL line change. And through the play of linemen like Tyquan Lewis and Jake Martin, the Colts haven't had a significant dropoff when Ebukam, Paye, DeForest Buckner, etc. come off the field. "We take pride in not having a weak link," Ollie said. "And that's when you can roll as a group, you can go out there and you could go four guys on and four guys off like hockey subs. If you can do that, any front you're on, you got a good group of guys." While these sacks have come in bunches, they haven't come in every game this season. The Colts are 1-7 when getting three or fewer sacks, with that lone win coming in a one-sack Week 5 over the Tennessee Titans. Opponents are scoring on 49 percent of their possessions in those eight games. The difference, defensive coordinator Gus Bradley said, is the Colts generally haven't been able to contain opposition running backs in those seven defeats. "Looking back at the last couple games where we didn't play well, the backs have come alive against us," Bradley said. "Cincinnati, it was the screen game. This past game, (Bijan) Robinson did a good job – both backs did a good job against us. We gave up some explosive plays whether it was them catching balls on passes, screen game, or on some of the runs. I think that's a common thread right now that we have to take care of – is slowing down these running back type plays that are getting yards against us." In those seven games with four-plus sacks, the Colts are holding opposing running backs to 4.7 yards per touch; in their other eight games running backs are averaging 5.8 yards per touch (the NFL average is 5.2 yards per touch allowed to running backs). "That's the only way to eventually rush the passer is stopping the run first, getting them behind the chains, forcing them to call riskier plays and try to call longer-developing plays down the field," Odeyingbo said. "So that kind of opens up opportunities for sacks." Ollie doesn't focus on sacks with his defensive line, though. The thing he's more interested in is the defensive line's effort board, which tracks "special efforts" – like a defensive lineman running downfield to make a tackle. The Colts have more of those high-effort plays than they do sacks. But the sacks also won't come without the commitment to those high-effort plays. And they'll need both to win their way into the playoffs over the season's final two weeks. "That's more a testament of the group than the sacks, just the effort that those guys play with each and every day," Ollie said. "In order to do that, you gotta be able to sub four guys in, four guys off and not missing a beat."

author: Analítica
title: Sistema de Orquestas de Venezuela anuncia gira para celebrar su 50 aniversario
text:
[Entretenimiento](/category/entretenimiento/)
Sistema de Orquestas de Venezuela anuncia gira para celebrar su 50 aniversario
Aunque arrancará en Europa, será el 12 de febrero cuando el Sistema celebre en Venezuela con un 'Exposistema', en el Teatro Teresa Carreño
El Sistema de Orquestas y Coros Juveniles e Infantiles de Venezuela celebrará el 50 aniversario de su fundación con una gira por Europa de la mano del maestro Gustavo Dudamel, que incluirá encuentros académicos con niños y jóvenes, así como conciertos conjuntos en siete ciudades.
En entrevista a EFE, Eduardo Méndez, director ejecutivo de la agrupación musical, explicó que la Orquesta Sinfónica Simón Bolívar será la encargada de inaugurar la celebración del cincuentenario con la gira europea, que comenzará en París el 11 de enero y seguirá en Londres, Luxemburgo, Berlín, Múnich, Bruselas y Madrid.
Añadió que en cada uno de estos lugares se celebrarán encuentros académicos con niños y jóvenes, y conciertos en conjunto de corte pedagógico.
“La celebración viene a llevar este mensaje también, además pacificador, este mensaje de unidad, este mensaje de transformación social, este mensaje de igualdad que es parte de lo que el Sistema manifiesta, realiza y lleva adelante con su orquesta”, sostuvo Méndez.
Sobre el repertorio, Méndez informó que estará integrado por obras como la sinfonía número 3 de Mahler y la cuarta de Tchaikovsky, además de piezas venezolanas que serán acompañadas con el cuatro de Jorge Glem.
Un mes después, específicamente el 12 de febrero el Sistema de Orquestas hará su celebración en Venezuela con un ‘Exposistema’, en el Teatro Teresa Carreño.

author: Zylahealth
title: Hydrogen Electrolyzer Manufacturers: Sustainable Solutions for Clean Energy - AtoAllinks
text: [] Hydrogen Electrolyzer Manufacturers: Sustainable Solutions for Clean Energy [](https://www.atoallinks.com/author/zylahealth/) [zylahealth](https://www.atoallinks.com/author/zylahealth/), [26 mins ago](https://www.atoallinks.com/2024/hydrogen-electrolyzer-manufacturers-sustainable-solutions-for-clean-energy/)4 min read 14 In the pursuit of cleaner and more sustainable energy solutions, hydrogen has emerged as a versatile and promising alternative. At the heart of hydrogen production lies the technology of hydrogen electrolyzers, which play a crucial role in converting water into hydrogen and oxygen using electricity, typically sourced from renewable energy sources like wind or solar power. Among the innovative leaders in this field is GreenH, a company dedicated to advancing [hydrogen electrolyzer](https://www.greenh.in/hydrogen/) technology and promoting a greener future. Understanding GreenH: Commitment to Sustainability GreenH has established itself as a frontrunner in hydrogen electrolyzer manufacturing, driven by a steadfast commitment to sustainability, innovation, and reliability. The company’s mission is rooted in developing cutting-edge solutions that not only meet but exceed industry standards for efficiency and environmental impact. By leveraging advanced technologies and continuous research and development, GreenH aims to contribute significantly to the global transition towards clean energy solutions. The Role of Hydrogen Electrolyzer Manufacturers in Clean Energy - Enabling Renewable Energy Integration: Hydrogen electrolyzers enable the efficient integration of renewable energy sources into the energy mix. GreenH’s electrolyzer systems are designed to convert surplus renewable electricity into hydrogen, which can be stored and utilized later when energy demand is high or renewable generation is low. This capability enhances grid stability and supports the widespread adoption of renewable energy technologies. - Promoting Decarbonization: As industries seek to reduce carbon emissions and mitigate climate change, hydrogen offers a clean alternative to traditional fossil fuels. GreenH’s electrolyzer solutions provide industries with a reliable and sustainable source of hydrogen for various applications, including transportation, industrial processes, and power generation. By replacing fossil fuels with hydrogen, GreenH contributes to decarbonizing sectors that are traditionally hard to electrify. - Supporting Zero-Emission Transportation: Hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicles (FCEVs) represent a promising solution for zero-emission transportation. GreenH supports the deployment of hydrogen refueling infrastructure, enabling FCEV owners to refuel quickly and conveniently while enjoying the benefits of long-range driving without harmful emissions. This infrastructure is crucial for expanding the adoption of FCEVs and reducing the transportation sector’s carbon footprint. GreenH’s Approach to Sustainable Solutions - Innovative Technology: GreenH invests heavily in research and development to advance hydrogen electrolyzer technology. The company focuses on improving efficiency, durability, and cost-effectiveness through innovations in proton exchange membrane (PEM) technology and system integration. These advancements ensure that GreenH’s electrolyzer systems deliver high performance while minimizing energy consumption and operational costs. - Scalable and Flexible Solutions: GreenH offers scalable electrolyzer solutions that can be customized to meet the specific needs of diverse industries and applications. Whether for small-scale distributed hydrogen production or large-scale industrial operations, GreenH provides flexible solutions that adapt to varying production capacities and operational requirements. This scalability supports the growth of hydrogen as a mainstream energy carrier across different sectors. - Commitment to Environmental Responsibility: Sustainability is at the core of GreenH’s business philosophy. The company adheres to stringent environmental standards throughout its manufacturing processes, aiming to minimize carbon footprint and waste generation. By promoting sustainable practices and technologies, GreenH demonstrates its dedication to environmental stewardship and corporate social responsibility. Applications Across Industries - Energy Sector: GreenH’s electrolyzer systems are deployed in renewable energy projects to store excess electricity as hydrogen, enhancing grid stability and supporting intermittent renewable energy sources. - Industrial Processes: Industries such as steel production, ammonia manufacturing, and refineries utilize hydrogen as a clean fuel or feedstock, reducing carbon emissions and enhancing operational efficiency. - Power Generation: Hydrogen produced by GreenH’s electrolyzers can be used in fuel cells to generate electricity, offering a reliable and sustainable alternative to fossil fuels for grid stabilization and backup power. Conclusion: Embracing a Sustainable Future with GreenH As the world transitions towards a low-carbon economy, hydrogen electrolyzer manufacturers like GreenH play a pivotal role in providing sustainable solutions for clean energy production. By advancing technology, promoting renewable energy integration, and supporting decarbonization efforts across industries, GreenH contributes to building a more sustainable future for generations to come. In summary, GreenH exemplifies leadership in hydrogen electrolyzer manufacturing, offering innovative solutions that enable the widespread adoption of hydrogen as a clean energy carrier. Through its commitment to sustainability, efficiency, and reliability, GreenH is driving the evolution of clean energy technologies and paving the way towards a greener and more sustainable future.
